title: Interpretation of a car in a dream and driving a car in a dream

preview.html: Dreaming about a car indicates travel, change of place, and other interpretations. We will interpret it for single women, married women, pregnant women, divorced women, and men, such as riding a black car, buying a white car, driving a red car, or selling an old or antique car. A new blue car by Ibn Sirin and more later on the topic: Interpretation of a car in a dream If you dream that you are driving a car in a dream, this portends that you are threatened with losing your job or contracting an illness, and if you fall from a car, you will soon receive sad news. If you dream of seeing a broken car, then you will fail in important matters and projects. But if you buy a car, it means that you will settle in your previous place and position. If you sell a car in a dream, it means that there will be unfortunate changes in your concerns and affairs. If you dream that you are driving a car, it means that you You will suffer under pleasant circumstances and bring about a change in your affairs, and this dream carries great risks of clumsy behavior. If the car breaks down with you, the enjoyment of pleasure will not extend to the heights you expect. If you find yourself escaping from the paths of a car, this indicates that it is a good idea to avoid a competitor as much as You can. But if a girl searches for a car, she will be disappointed in her goals of seducing someone for her own benefit. If you dream of seeing cars, it means travel and changes in quick succession. If you drive a car, this indicates that the trip you arranged in meditation will take place under different auspices. What you were thinking aboutBut if you lose a car, it means that you will achieve some important projects that will make you feel self-respecting. If you dream of sleeping cars, it means that your struggle to accumulate wealth is driven by the desire to satisfy selfish and immoral principles that you must overcome and control. You saw baby carriages in your dreams, it means that someone is really interested in causing trouble and disturbance. If you are driving a car, this foretells that competition and jealousy will infiltrate your happiness. If you stand on a roadbed while cars are driving, it means that you will try to pursue a business that will be implicitly dangerous. But if You advance without incident, you will succeed. If the sidewalk is raised, your danger will be more obvious. If it is low, you will hit your target badly. 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');Buying a new car in a dream for a girl is evidence that she will receive good news. Buying a car is evidence of progress in work and a new life. Interpretation of selling a car in a dreamSeeing a person He sells

title: Interpretation of thread in a dream or seeing threads in a dream

preview.html: Dreaming about thread indicates the end of anxiety, fatigue, and other interpretations. We will interpret it for an unmarried girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man, such as seeing a spool of white thread, sewing with black thread, cutting red, green, black or colored threads or seeing a needle and silk thread or pulling the thread from the son’s body. Siren and more: Interpretation of a thread in a dream. Seeing a thread in a dream indicates evidence. Whoever sees in his dream that he has obtained the thread, then he is a person asking for evidence and intending the truth in an important matter, because God Almighty says: (Now associate with them and seek what He has commanded. May God bless you, and eat and drink until the white thread becomes distinct to you from the black thread at dawn, then fast until nightfall). He had slaughtered the camel. string. The complex threads of interpretation suggest magic and sorcery.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');And whoever sees in a dream that he is twisting a rope or thread or wrapping it around his body, then he will travel. If he dreams that he is spinning cotton or flax, then he will suffer illness, disease, or humiliation among his family and clan. The knotted threads are magical, and the white thread indicates dawn and the black thread indicates night. As for a woman who sees in her dream that they are spinning or spinning threads, she will receive an absent loved one. Or traveling or exploding. If she sees in her dream that she is holding a spindle, then if she is pregnant she will give birth or give birth to a girl. Other women hear good news about their sisters or daughters, and if the thread or spindle breaks, a quarrel breaks out between her and her peers. As for the one who sees in her dream the thread of her hijab, dress, burqa, niqab, or dress being removed, then she is leaving the one she loves. If a thread of the veil or garment burns, it will befall evil, anxiety, or fear. atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : { } }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');The thread, in interpretation, is similar to ropes, wires, tools, and other means used for tying, tying, tightening, and rigidity. Also, the thread is a cause, and if it descends from the sky, then the Qur’an, religion, and the thick thread or Strong indicates influence, and cutting a thread indicates exhaustion of money or loss of knowledge. Interpretation of a thread in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that if he sees in a dream that he is tying a thread around a neck

title: Interpretation of a dream about distributing inheritance in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about distributing inheritance in a dream. If you want to know the interpretation of a dream about distributing inheritance in a dream, it is one of the interpretations that some people want to know. What this dream means and whether it is a sign of good or evil. In the reality of the dream and its good interpretation, it is the jurisprudence of scholars. Interpretation of a dream about dividing an inheritance in a dream: Sharing an inheritance in a dream may indicate the good that the dreamer will receive in his life, thanks to God. A person’s dream of dividing an inheritance may indicate the great responsibility that falls on his shoulders at this time, and God knows best. In the event of a vision To distribute an inheritance in a dream, it may indicate good events that will come to the dreamer in his life during this period. It is possible that seeing the distribution of an inheritance in a dream indicates positive changes that will occur to the dreamer in his life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of distributing banknotes in a dream may indicate Distributing banknotes in a dream indicates that he is a person who extends a helping hand to people. A dream of offering banknotes in a dream may indicate the end of worries and sorrows from the dreamer’s life during this period. If there is a vision of distributing banknotes in a dream, this may indicate the alms and supplications that he offers The person having the vision to those around him. If there is a vision of distributing money in a dream, it may indicate successful deals that the person having the vision will make during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about distributing grape leaves in a dream: A dream about distributing grape leaves in a dream may indicate gifts that will come to the visionary during This time, and God knows best. In the event that a person saw that he was distributing grape leaves in a dream, this may indicate that he is a successful person in his field of work during those days. It is possible that seeing distributing grape leaves in a dream indicates good events that will come to the visionary. During this period, thanks to God. Seeing distributing grape leaves in a dream may indicate success in work or study, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about distributing written exams in a dream: Distributing written exams in a dream may indicate good events that will come to the dreamer in his life during this period. In the event that If a person sees that he is distributing exam papers, this may indicate that he has gone through a difficult period in the life of the person who has the vision and needs to ask God for help. It is possible that seeing the distribution of written exams in a dream is evidence of success and success in life thanks to God. When a person sees that he Distributing exam papers in a dream, this may indicate changes occurring in the dreamer’s life to a great extent during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of distributing saffron in a dream If a person sees himself distributing yolks in a dream, this may indicate good deeds carried out by the owner of the exam. The vision in his life at that time. When you see the distribution of saffron in a dream, it may be an indication of the happy events that will come to the dreamer in his life during those days. Seeing the distribution of saffron in a dream may indicate positive changes occurring in the dreamer’s life in a way

title: Interpretation of a dream about a single woman’s engagement by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about engagement for a single woman: There are many interpretations in interpreting this dream because it haunts many girls and often expresses their desire to have a life partner. They can express how few good feelings such as love and attention are, and this vision is often just a reflection of self-talk, which It makes it devoid of any interpretation of the meaning, but we will include in this article some of the clues that we received from commentators. Interpretation of a dream about engagement for a single womanMany interpreters agreed that seeing an unmarried woman in a dream about engagement on Friday at any time in the morning is good news for her that she She will marry a person with good morals and good characteristics, which means that their relationship will be stable and happy. Engaging in a dream for a girl who is not yet married may express her need for a good man to share her days with her. A vision of engagement may express the dreamer’s lack of family presence and his strong desire to build a family Stable with a good husband. If a girl sees that she is marrying someone she loves, this expresses her intense love and a strong relationship with this person. It is a sign of stopping worry and being happy. Interpretation of a dream about Ibn Sirin’s engagement to an unmarried woman. The meanings of engagement in a dream differ according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of an unmarried woman. It has many connotations, including that the dreamer’s marriage will be to a person who has a high status among his people, and he will live with him in happiness and stability. If The girl got engaged in a noisy atmosphere at a party full of noise. This may indicate that the person who wants to propose to her or marry her is not suitable for her and will not agree with him. If she agrees to the engagement on Friday, this is an indication that praiseworthy things will happen, and an abundance of kindness. If A mother sees in a dream that her eldest daughter is getting engaged, which means that her daughter is excelling in her field of study, and if the dreamer sees that his younger sister is getting engaged, it is because of the intense interest in her. And her future. If a girl sees her younger sister’s engagement, this means that she can establish an official relationship without problems. Interpretation of the dream of engagement for a single woman according to Imam al-Sadiq. Imam Jaafar al-Sadiq differs in his interpretation of the vision of a girl’s engagement, as he sees in it success, privilege, and happy good news for achieving what the dreamer seeks. You also see that postponing the engagement and the emergence of some things that may obstruct the engagement symbolize preventing the insight from achieving what it wants and reaching what it seeks. What is the interpretation of wearing an engagement ring in a dream for a single woman? The interpretation of the meaning of the ring varies depending on the material from which this ring is made, as follows :Ibn Sirin said that there is a difference between a gold ring and a silver ring when interpreting this dream, as he sees that the golden ring indicates marriage to a wealthy man, but they may face some problems due to the difference in opinion as well as deficiency. Agreeing on certain principles. A silver ring indicates engagement, but if she sees that she has a diamond ring on her hand, this is a sign that a famous person has proposed to her and is interested in making her happy and that she feels satisfied with him. He also believes that this vision is a sign of God

title: Interpretation of baldness in a dream: A girl without hair in a dream

preview.html: The dream of a bald girl shows the emergence of disorder and other interpretations that we will explain to the single, married, pregnant, divorced, man, how to see baldness on his head. Or a woman’s hair falling out, or seeing a woman without hair, according to Ibn Sirin and others in continuation of the topic: Interpretation of baldness in a dream. Whoever saw a bald woman in a dream is a controversial matter, and seeing a bald woman in a dream is evidence of a new year in which many events and changes will occur in the life of a woman. The dreamer: A woman’s baldness expresses fatigue and anxiety because a woman’s hair is her crown, and a man or woman seeing a bald woman in a dream is evidence of this woman’s negligence in her household affairs or her husband’s rights to her. An unmarried woman who sees in her dream that she has lost her hair expresses, in principle, Major psychological problems, the source of which is an emotional or existential emptiness. If a girl sees as if she is looking at the woman in her dream and finds that her hair is scattered or completely fallen out, or she notices an emptiness on her head, this is an expression that she is suffering from psychological discomfort or a state of depression. As it suggests Hair emptiness symbolizes emotional emptiness, as it is known that a girl has more emotional energy than a young man. The dream of baldness falls into this context, just as pimples or pimples on the face and skin, or the loss of teeth are evidence of despair and hopelessness. In this context, experts advise exercising, engaging in social activity, or praying to God and praying, and all of these topics help the girl overcome her crises and worries. A married woman who sees in her dream that she has become bald and lost her hair is likely to live in somewhat harsh or difficult circumstances. Most married women who see baldness have many worries and problems in their waking lives. The good thing about this vision is that the woman sees in her dream that the people around her are treating her normally, without alienation or disgust, especially on the part of the husband, because the dream in this image It expresses the end of problems and worries. If it exists. This interpretation applies to pregnant women, divorcees, and widows. The interpretation of the appearance of a bald woman in a man’s dream is not good, because it expresses the worries of the world and the cruelty of life, and an ugly bald woman is a world of problems and fragments. It is good to leave them or escape from them. If the dreamer sees a bald woman attacking him or chasing him, this is his interpretation of the great obstacles that may stand in his way, and he is not thankful in dreams for eating food from them. To dream of a woman without hair can indicate tension and sadness and it can indicate a lot of money and a lot of money in path to itatOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');Shaving hair in a dreamFor a man, this is a praiseworthy thing, for you

title: Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a beautiful, laughing child in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about the birth of a beautiful child, laughing in a dream. In the following lines, we will present an interpretation of a dream about the birth of a beautiful child, laughing in a dream, according to what is stated in the books of scholars, not personal interpretations and what is good or evil.. Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a beautiful child, laughing in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a child. A beautiful man laughing in a dream can be a sign of goodness, and God knows the unseen. title: Interpretation of a dream about hitting one’s mother or seeing one’s mother in a dream

preview.html: Seeing your mother hitting your mother in a dream means that you will receive benefits and other interpretations. We will explain this to a married, pregnant or divorced single woman to a man, such as a boy hitting his mother or a girl hitting her. Her mother, or seeing a son beating his mother in Ibn Sirin, and others in continuation of the topic: Interpretation of hitting a mother in a dream. Seeing a beating in a dream means that the beating benefits the attacker, as long as the beating is not painful or painful or does not result in blood or death in the dream. Seeing a son In a dream, that he hits his mother or hurts her is an obscene and painful thing that makes the viewer feel inferior, self-deprecating, ashamed, and contempt towards her. This scene is considered one of the unacceptable scenes that society as a whole condemns and the religion forbids, but the interpretation of seeing a son hitting his mother in a dream differs, as scholars said. The interpreters say that this dream is concrete evidence that this is true. son. His mother and the benefit from the mother. Whether that mother is alive, the benefit is represented by affection, respect, and satisfying her needs, and if the mother dies, the benefit is in praying for her and constant charity. Hitting the mother in a dream indicates committing a great sin and indicates disobedience to God and always resisting elders and disrespecting them. The vision also advises the dreamer to return to his mind, leave these bad thoughts, and stay away from the people in his environment, otherwise he will not find the right path. And whoever sees that he is hitting his mother in a dream, it is not permissible for his family to forgive him for the sins he commits, and not to take back his mistakes. It also indicates that A person does not listen to what his family says and always resists them by doing worthless things, and thus he receives bad prayers from people and lives a miserable life, and because of his mistakes and sins he will face difficult days. He may also not reap the fruits of his diligence and work, and instead he will be exposed to trouble and his mood will be ruined by receiving some news. sad.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');Hitting his mother in a dream in general indicates that the person grew up without a mother, and it is a dream seen by some adult orphans, and because this person does not have a mother, He always feels anger in his heart and blames him. The mother because of her absence, and he always links any problem or suffering to the absence of his mother and not being there for him. Seeing a person hitting his mother in a dream means that he remembers some of the words that his mother told him, and if his mother dies, this indicates some of the shortcomings that the person suffers from in his life. As for If she is alive, this indicates the difficulty of a person reaching his mother, as he cannot contact her for some reason, perhaps a problem, a disorder, or something like that. Interpretation of hitting your mother in a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing yourself hitting your mother in a dream is a hint of your fears and thoughts about what If you have made a good impression on someone...

title: Interpretation of Imam Ali bin Abi Talib in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Whoever sees Ali bin Abi Talib in a dream, this indicates the end of worries, problems, and other interpretations that we will explain to the divorced woman, the married woman, the pregnant woman, the divorced woman, such as. The visit of the Commander of the Faithful, or the shrine of Imam Ali, to the shrine of Imam Ali in Najaf, or a conversation with Imam Ali from Ibn Sirin, and so on. In continuation of the topic: Interpretation of Imam Ali in a dream. Jurists unanimously agree that the interpretation of dreams is seeing Imam Ali in his fingers. It has different interpretations and meanings, including that the dreamer will be able to overcome adversity, and seeing Imam Ali in a dream means getting rid of the dreamer’s pursuers, haters, and envious people. It was said that the vision indicates transcendence. difficulties and their achievement. What the dreamer wants, whether the dreamer is male or female. Seeing Imam Ali sitting in a place where people worship in a dream means that there will be unrest and disagreements in that place, and God knows best. Seeing Imam Ali in a sheikh or student’s dream indicates courage in speaking the truth and strength. Personality and increased knowledge and commitment to the duties of religion. Likewise, seeing Imam Ali shows asceticism in life, intensity of humility and faith, and it was said: guidance, good deeds, and status for those who see it.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height ' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');Seeing the scholar or sheikh Imam Ali bin Abi Talib in his dream symbolizes knowledge, power and majesty, and he often sees scholars, jurist, righteous man, or one of the imams, may God be pleased with him. About them and pleasing them in a dream predicts the death of the dreamer as a witness. Seeing the ruler in front of Ali bin Abi Talib in a dream portends conquest and clear victory, or it may be an indication of the caliphate or an arduous journey. In general, seeing Imam Ali bin Abi Talib in a dream symbolizes learning knowledge and shows that the dreamer A brave person who does not give up his rights, and the vision shows justice and piety and shows humility and asceticism. Seeing a person as if the Imam, may God be pleased with him, alive and walking among the people symbolizes that the dreamer is envied. The person who sees Imam Ali in a dream will be a person of great importance and status among the people or he will be Someone who speaks languages ​​fluently, courageously, boldly, strong, honest and sincere.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');Seeing Imam Ali bin Abi Talib alive in a dream symbolizes the amount of knowledge and knowledge of the people of that place, and also indicates the removal of oppression and injustice and the attainment of truth and justice. And the best The vision of the man is the vision of Imam Ali bin Abi Talib

title: Interpretation of an office in a dream or entering an office in a dream

preview.html: A dream about an office indicates achieving success and other interpretations. We will interpret it for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a married or unmarried man, for example. The work desk, the department, or sitting at the work desk, whether it is clean, dirty, spacious, narrow, luxurious, new, or wooden, according to Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi and others, in continuation of the topic: Interpretation of the desk in a dream. The desk symbolizes the mind or awareness, and in the interpretation it indicates the skill of insight and the correctness of his ideas and choices. The future. The office is a sign of promotion or success, and this expression applies only to organized and clean offices, because if the office appeared in another way, it would be an expression of the lack of clarity of vision of the visionary, or his psychological and financial instability. A dirty office symbolizes bad and negative thoughts. Interpretation of the office in one dream. If The girl saw as if she was sitting in an office far from the noise, luxurious and equipped with all means, this tells us about her good mind or herself full of ambitions, and this girl necessarily strives to achieve the highest levels of success. .atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');If she sees that she is running a company or organization through this wonderful and luxurious office, then in waking life she expects something important that may happen in the near or distant future. If She sees that she receives a stranger or a person in her office, then in reality she can create a new friendship or relationship whose essence is practical or professional, but which can develop outside this framework of what is human or emotional. The more tidy and clean the office is, the more the dream indicates the salvation of the mind And the correctness of decisions, and attention must be paid to office furniture in detail, as it can have a deeper meaning than just being a piece of home furniture. A married woman sees in her dream that she has a luxurious and spacious office in her home that is well organized and appropriate. In reality, she is preparing for something important and at the same time. Happy time, because the term office in this context refers to something related to the success of the practice, whether the office is just a desk, a desk, or an entire room equipped with the latest and most luxurious collectibles. The home office also suggests luxury or material well-being and can indicate a prominent social status. If a married woman sees a strange man Other than her husband sitting in the office room, this is interpreted as good luck if the man is handsome, handsome or has features of dignity on his face and the office also shows his mind and mind. Its capabilities if it is filled with books or folders. Its capacity is an office in a pregnancy dream. In this context, it indicates preservation and security, because it is a very special place and its possessions are often valuable that require protection.

title: Interpretation of a dream about distributing breakfast to a fasting person in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about distributing breakfast to the fasting person in a dream. We may search for an interpretation of the dream of distributing breakfast to the fasting person in a dream, and there are a large number of connotations and interpretations of dreams. Interpretation of the dream of distributing breakfast to the fasting person in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream that he is distributing breakfast to the fasting person in a dream, perhaps this indicates good health. His behavior during that period. A dream of distributing breakfast to a fasting person in a dream may indicate that things will become much easier in those days, thanks to God. If one sees that he is distributing breakfast to a fasting person, this may indicate the fulfillment of desires and dreams, thanks to God. If one sees that he He was eating breakfast for the fasting person in a dream. This may indicate a new stage that the dreamer has entered to a great extent during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of distributing green apples in a dream. Distributing green apples in a dream may indicate the success that will happen to the dreamer in his life during that period. In If one sees that he is distributing green apples in a dream, this may be an indication of the end of fears and problems from the dreamer’s life in those days. Green apples and their distribution in a dream may indicate the love and friendship that exists between the dreamer and those around him, thanks to God. In the event that one sees a green apple and distributes it In a dream, this may be an indication of the end of problems and crises in the dreamer’s life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of distributing boiled eggs in a dream: Distributing boiled eggs in a dream may indicate a profitable trade that the dreamer obtained, thanks to God. A dream of distributing eggs could indicate Boiled eggs in a dream indicate the abundant money that the dreamer will obtain during this period. Seeing the distribution of boiled eggs in a dream may indicate positive changes that will occur to the dreamer in his life during this period. Seeing the distribution of boiled eggs in a dream may indicate good events that will come to the dreamer in his life in Those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about distributing blankets in a dream: Distributing blankets in a dream may indicate the comfort that the dreamer feels a lot during those days. It is possible that seeing blankets distributed in a dream indicates the dreamer’s efforts to obtain good things, and God knows best. The dream may indicate that Distributing blankets in a dream indicates that he is a person of good character and good dealings. If one sees that he distributes blankets to those around him, this may indicate the good offspring that the dreamer may have in the coming days, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about distributing the week of the birth in a dream: Distributing the week of the birth may be In a dream, it is an indication of the arrival of many good things to the vision, thanks to God. A dream about the distribution of the week of the newborn may indicate the happiness that comes to the dreamer in his life at that time. It is possible that seeing the distribution of the week of the newborn in a dream indicates the stability of the family that will happen to the newborn in his life. In those days, and God knows best. If the person saw that he was giving birth during the week of the baby, this may indicate the end of the worries and problems that the dreamer suffered from in the previous period, and God knows best. Interpretation
